# Project

## 1. Vancouver Business Licence Data

**Description:**
In this project I used the Vancouver Open Data Portal to analyze data for an emerging business in the area. Using the Vancouver Open Data Portal, I was able to acquire the numbers of all the business licences in the finance sector that reside in the Vancouver area.

**Skills Demonstrated:**
- Data analysis

- R markdown

- Data Interpretation

- Business Recommendations/Strategic analysis
